description:
At Smith and Messina, Attorneys at Law, in Blasdell, New York, we provide dedicated bankruptcy, family law, personal injury and real estate law services. Offering small-firm attention and big-firm services, our attorneys help people navigate some of life's most complex legal challenges.

Representing people throughout the Buffalo, New York, area, our law firm handles an array of complex cases. Our experience includes helping clients achieve favorable resolutions to cases involving matters such as the following:

  • Foreclosure defense
  • Divorce
  • Child custody and child support
  • Chapter 7 and Chapter 13 bankruptcy
  • Debt settlement
  • Personal injury

Also advocating on behalf of those injured by the actions of others, our law firm represents clients with auto accidents, construction accidents, dog bites and other such negligence claims. We strive to help those injured through no fault of their own to recover the compensation they need and deserve.

We know that no two clients, nor their cases, are the same, which is why we offer free initial consultations at Smith and Messina, Attorneys at Law. Our attorneys take time to talk to clients about themselves, their legal situations, and their needs and goals before providing thoughtful guidance tailored to suit their specific circumstances and legal objectives.

Our law firm accepts credit cards.
